Coffee Recipes » V60

How to Brew Coffee with a V60

Written by

James' Coffee Blog

Takes 2 minutes to prepare, serves 1 person.

Instructions

  1. Pour 50 grams of water over the grounds.
  2. Stir in the north, east, south, west directions and in every direction between.
  3. Pour continuously until I reach 250 grams.
  4. Swirl the brew to remove grounds from the top of the filter paper.
  5. Wait until the coffee draws down.
